item.title: About
item.description: Hi, I’m Thales Bruno from Salvador, Brazil. I have a Computer Science bachelor’s degree and I have been working as IT Infrastructure Analyst for almost 5 years as well as a Web Developer enthusiast and now I am trying a career switch to Data Science. The Posts section is a kind of blog where I will post some articles about contents I am learning and working on.
